articles.title: Shane Warne's friends in Thailand meet with police to discuss returning his body to Australia
articles.description: Friends of Shane Warne who were staying with him in Thailand before his unexpected death meet with Thai Police to discuss repatriating the Australian cricketing great's body.
articles.content:
Friends of Shane Warne who were staying with him in Thailand before his unexpected death have met with Thai Police to discuss repatriating the Australian cricketing great's body.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Melbourne stand to be named after Warne
articles.description: Tributes pour in for cricketing great Shane Warne, who died on Friday, with a stand at the Melbourne Cricket Ground to be named after him and a minute's silence held before Australia men and women's matches.
articles.content:
Tributes have come from around the world following Shane Warne's death on Friday

articles.author: Tom Decent, Roy Ward, Mathew Dunckley
articles.title: Shane Warne dead at 52: Australian cricketer dies of suspected heart attack, shocking sports world
articles.description: The Australian cricket legend died of a suspected heart attack in Thailand. He was 52. Join our live coverage as tributes from around the world pour in.
articles.content:
The Australian Professional Poker community is grieving the death of Shane Warne, with pro Australian player Tony Hachem paying tribute to his close friend of over 20 years.

articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
